snippet: Following Rick Santorum's sudden rise to prominence in the race for the Republican presidential nomination, new attention has been paid to his views on foreign policy issues, which apparently include a firm conviction that the West Bank is "part of...
abstract: Following Rick Santorum's sudden rise to prominence in the race for the Republican presidential nomination, new attention has been paid to his views on foreign policy issues, which apparently include a firm conviction that the West Bank is "part of Israel."
lead_paragraph: Following Rick Santorum's sudden rise to prominence in the race for the Republican presidential nomination, new attention has been paid to his views on foreign policy issues, which apparently include a firm conviction that the West Bank is "part of Israel."

headline.main: Santorum Insists West Bank Is 'Part of Israel'
